1.0.name: wordpress/right-now-extended
1.0.description:
The “Right Now” Extended Plugin allows you to decide which statistics to show on your “Right Now” dashboard widget on the control panel. You may choose the statistics you want from the following list:

  • Posts
  • Pages
  • Categories
  • Tags
  • Comments
  • Links
  • Users
  • Media

For further information, please visit the official plugin site: “Right Now” Extended Plugin (for WordPress) | Three Dots.
